00001 // LDMX
00002 #include "EventDisplay/EventDisplay.h"
00003 
00004 // ROOT
00005 #include "TRint.h"
00006 
00007 // TEVE
00008 #include "TEveBrowser.h"
00009 
00010 #include <string>
00011 
00012 using ldmx::EventDisplay;
00013 
00014 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00015 
00016     if (argc != 2) {
00017         std::cout << "The event display requires 1 argument!" << std::endl;
00018         std::cout << "The argument is the ROOT file containing the event to be visualized." << std::endl;
00019         return -1;
00020     }
00021 
00022     const char* file = argv[1];
00023 
00024     TRint *app = new TRint("App", &argc, argv);
00025 
00026     TEveManager::Create();
00027 
00028     TEveBrowser* browser = gEve->GetBrowser();
00029     browser->StartEmbedding(TRootBrowser::kLeft);
00030 
00031     gEve->AddEvent(new TEveEventManager("LDMX Detector", ""));
00032     EventDisplay *display = new EventDisplay();
00033     gEve->AddEvent(new TEveEventManager("LDMX Event", ""));
00034 
00035     browser->StopEmbedding();
00036     browser->SetTabTitle("Event Control", 0);
00037 
00038     display->SetFile(file);
00039 
00040     app->Run(kFALSE);
00041     app->Terminate(0);
00042 
00043     return 0;
00044 }
